title: A Royal Affair
synopsis: In 18th-century Denmark, the unstable King Christian VII neglects his young queen, Mathilde, who falls in love with his German physician.

title: In China They Eat Dogs
synopsis: A few hours after bank clerk Arvid knocks out a robber with his squash racket, the robber's wife appeals to Arvid with a sad tale of woe.

title: The Rain
synopsis: Six years after a brutal virus wipes out most of Scandinavia's population, two siblings join a band of young survivors seeking safety -- and answers.

title: Pusher 2: With Blood on My Hands
synopsis: After doing time in prison for his involvement with the underworld, habitual screwup Tonny tries to win the approval of his gangster father.

title: Love Is All You Need
synopsis: A group of people in Italy search for love, and deal with jealousy, passion and loneliness as they struggle to change their lives for the better.

title: Ronal Barbaren
synopsis: When their entire barbarian tribe is kidnapped, a ragtag group of inexperienced barbarians must defy all odds on a quest to save their world.

title: A War
synopsis: When a decision he makes in combat results in the deaths of civilians in Afghanistan, a Danish officer is called home to face war crimes charges.

title: Rita
synopsis: Independent, outspoken and adored by her students, private school teacher Rita fares less well with adults in this comedy-drama from Denmark.

title: The Commune
synopsis: A Copenhagen couple decides to liven up their marriage by hosting a communal living space, but desire and jealousy soon threaten the peace.

title: En chance til
synopsis: After his infant son suddenly dies, a police detective steals a drug-addicted couple's neglected baby, leaving his son's body in place of their child.

title: Underverden
synopsis: When his younger brother is killed in a gang-related activity, Zaid seeks revenge, leaving behind a successful medical career and a happy family life.

title: April 9th
synopsis: On a fateful day after the dawn of World War II, the courageous Danish bicycle infantry staves off invading German forces as it awaits reinforcements.

title: Northwest
synopsis: An ambitious teen working for a local crime boss finds himself swimming in dangerous waters when he accepts an offer from a rival crime lord.

title: Klovn Forever
synopsis: In this sequel to “Klown,” Casper moves to LA -- with Frank on his heels -- where the incorrigible pair proceed to trounce taboos and “go Hollywood.”

title: The Shamer's Daughter
synopsis: A reviled widow and her daughter, who have the ability to peer into people's souls, are called upon to investigate the murder of the royal family.

title: Klassefesten
synopsis: Three middle-aged men who get together for their 25-year class reunion discover that partying and acting like boys isn't as easy as it used to be.

title: Kandidaten
synopsis: Framed and blackmailed for a brutal murder, defense attorney Jonas Bechmann frantically searches for the people who've set him up.

title: Dicte
synopsis: A crime reporter starts a new life by returning to her hometown, where she finds herself at odds with the police when she tries to solve their cases.

title: All for Two
synopsis: After going their separate ways, once-chummy criminals Nikolai, Ralf and Timo reunite for one last score: to get back what's rightfully theirs.

title: At World's End
synopsis: Hilarity and action combine in this unique thriller about psychiatrist Adrian, who is sent to Sumatra to judge the sanity of a fellow Dane, Severin, whose excuse for committing murder is that he was guarding a rare plant that can bestow immortality.

title: Klassefesten 2: Begravelsen
synopsis: After another friend dies during a wild bachelor party, a groom-to-be and his two pals set out for the funeral while debating their own murky futures.

title: Undercover
synopsis: With Christmas just around the corner, a spunky police officer is ordered to keep an eye on a dodgy witness, who has angry enemies to spare.

title: Player
synopsis: A lawyer's humdrum life is jolted after he's hustled out of millions. Fortunately, he soon meets his knight in shining armor: an old pal who gambles.

title: 3 Ting
synopsis: After ripping off a Siberian gang, an explosives expert enters the witness protection program with three unique demands.

title: Over the Edge
synopsis: Soon after moving into their dream country home, mercurial lovers David and Freja become entangled in the dark aftereffects of a suspicious suicide.

title: Olsen-banden pa de bonede gulve
synopsis: The gang is given a job for the Prime Minister's Office: Steal H. C. Andersen's quill pen. But what about Hallandsen, their enemy? Egon has a plan.

title: Grev Axel
synopsis: Traveling actor Axel makes out royally when he steals the garb of a long-lost count. His new role is a great fit, until the real nobleman appears.

title: Hjordis
synopsis: This miniseries spinoff of 'Rita' follows teacher Hjørdis as she plans a school play on bullying featuring a cast of socially awkward students.

title: Jensen and Jensen
synopsis: Two amateur bounty hunters are up against sadistic cops, armed Vatican cardinals and a horny goat as they track down Europe's most dangerous criminal.

title: Key House Mirror
synopsis: While caring for her paralyzed husband in a nursing home, a woman yearning for excitement and intimacy develops an affair with a new resident.

title: Danny's Doomsday
synopsis: Two teenage brothers must set aside their bitter feud when climate changes give birth to terrifying creatures dead set on eating everything in sight.

title: Olsen Banden på dybt vand
synopsis: Felonious Egon Olsen and his cronies scheme to rip off an oil company, but crocodiles, a ramshackle submarine and other troubles hinder their plans.

title: Comeback
synopsis: After his teenage daughter re-enters his life, a comedic has-been realizes their relationship can make or break his attempt to revive his career.

title: Iqbal and den hemmelige opskrift
synopsis: After blowing up his school by mistake, a quirky teen must hunt down two kooky crooks who are holding his brother hostage for the explosive’s recipe.

title: Far til fire's vilde ferie
synopsis: A family's Wadden Sea vacation goes off the rails when Dad is accused of burglary. Now, the entire clan must pull together to nab the real thieves.

title: Emma and Julemanden
synopsis: Feeling overlooked by her own family, an imaginative young girl embarks upon an otherworldly adventure to rescue Santa's newborn daughter.

title: Father of Four: The return of uncle Sofus
synopsis: When his uncle's cranky twin Sofus enters his Australian cow in a milking contest, Far and his kids must work hard to win the prize and Sofus's heart.
